summary: IVRCL Technical Services & Solutions is under liquidation as a going concern and has been facing severe cash crunch due to delayed sale process, resulting in delayed project execution and risk of lapse of pre-qualifications. However, the company has a good number of long-serving employees and is awaiting opportunities to participate in new projects. The government's target investment of 100 Lac Crore in Infrastructure Industry by 2025 provides a prospective and encouraging environment for Civil & Contracting companies.

properties.reason: Delayed project execution and severe cash crunch
